column2: "You're a new face. I wonder if you were in the final exam on Naberius the other day?"
"Looks like I hit the nail on the head. I might as well tell you something you don't know about that."
"A team was sent down to help the exam takers deal with the Darker outbreak, but it was completely wiped out."
"You should consider yourself lucky to have come back alive from that."
"But what I still don't understand is how an experienced team could have been totally destroyed by Darkers."
"Someone is probably looking into it, so I'll leave it at that."
"But it seems like Darker numbers are on the rise compared to the last couple of years, so be careful."
